title: Greench

fields.name: Note:
fields.value: This role may only spawn during the @Tatsu#8792 bot's "Starlight Festival" event. It is guaranteed to spawn on any rolelist during that time.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attempt to steal presents from another player (Day)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you attempt to steal presents from another player, that player must not succeed in any "Starlight Festival" events from the <@172002275412279296> bot in order for your thievery to succeed.
- There WILL be a channel for starlight festival events. If a starlight festival event spawns, you may not participate.
Stealing a present successfully disables their action until they succeed.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Prevent the GIM tree from leveling up during your time OR kill all who would oppose you

desc:
Post 2235
*"How nice of you to prepare all these presents for me!"*
